name: Upsert Tool Test
description: Create or update a tool's Jest test file. Writes test code to tests/[category]/[name].test.ts for automated testing of tool functionality.

tool_name.description: The function_name of the tool to create tests for

category.description: Tool category (must match the tool's category)

test_code.description: TypeScript Jest test code for the tool

target_space.description: Optional target space for space-specific tool tests
